variable.name: cpu.verbose-step
variable.description: enable/disable verbosity when simulating an instruction

variable.name: cpu.verbose-dtlb
variable.description: enable/disable verbosity when accessing data translation lookahead buffer

variable.name: cpu.verbose-dl1
variable.description: enable/disable verbosity when accessing L1 data cache

variable.name: cpu.verbose-il1
variable.description: enable/disable verbosity when accessing L1 instruction cache

variable.name: cpu.verbose-l2
variable.description: enable/disable verbosity when accessing L2 unified cache

variable.name: cpu.verbose-load
variable.description: enable/disable verbosity when simulating a load

variable.name: cpu.verbose-store
variable.description: enable/disable verbosity when simulating a store

variable.name: cpu.verbose-read-memory
variable.description: enable/disable verbosity when reading memory for a debug purpose

variable.name: cpu.verbose-write-memory
variable.description: enable/disable verbosity when writing memory for a debug purpose

variable.name: cpu.trap-on-instruction-counter
variable.description: number of simulated instruction before traping

variable.name: cpu.max-inst
variable.description: maximum number of instructions to simulate

variable.name: erom.cycle-time
variable.description: RAM memory cycle time in picoseconds

variable.name: flash.cycle-time
variable.description: flash memory cycle time in picoseconds

variable.name: heathrow.initial-base-addr
variable.description: initial base address of memory space

variable.name: i8042.fsb-frequency
variable.description: front side bus frequency in Mhz

variable.name: i8042.typematic-delay
variable.description: typematic delay (key repeat delay in seconds)

variable.name: kernel_logger.std_err
variable.description: Show logger output through the standard error output

variable.name: kernel_logger.std_out
variable.description: Show logger output through the standard output

variable.name: kernel_logger.std_err_color
variable.description: Colorize logger output through the standard error output (only works if std_err is active)

variable.name: kernel_logger.std_out_color
variable.description: Colorize logger output through the standard output (only works if std_out is active)

variable.name: kernel_logger.file
variable.description: Keep logger output in a file

variable.name: kernel_logger.filename
variable.description: Filename to keep logger output (the option file must be activated)

variable.name: kernel_logger.xml_file
variable.description: Keep logger output in a file xml formatted

variable.name: kernel_logger.xml_filename
variable.description: Filename to keep logger xml output (the option xml_file must be activated)

variable.name: kernel_logger.xml_file_gzipped
variable.description: If the xml_file option is active, the output file will be compressed (a .gz extension will be automatically added to the xml_filename option

variable.name: pci-isa-bridge.initial-base-addr
variable.description: intial base address of memory space

variable.name: pci-isa-bridge.initial-io-base-addr
variable.description: initial base address of I/O space

variable.name: pmac-linux-kernel-loader.pmac-bootx.device-tree-filename
variable.description: device tree file name of simulated PowerMac machine

variable.name: pmac-linux-kernel-loader.pmac-bootx.ramdisk-filename
variable.description: initial ramdisk filename (either compressed with gzip or uncompressed)

variable.name: pmac-linux-kernel-loader.elf32-loader.filename
variable.description: the ELF filename to load into memory

variable.name: pmac-linux-kernel-loader.elf32-loader.base-addr
variable.description: if not null, a forced base address for a unique program segment

variable.name: pmac-linux-kernel-loader.elf32-loader.force-use-virtual-address
variable.description: force use of virtual addresses instead of physical addresses

variable.name: pmac-linux-kernel-loader.elf32-loader.dump-headers
variable.description: dump headers while loading ELF file

variable.name: sdl.bmp-out-filename
variable.description: if not empty implicitely enable screen capture and specify prefix of captured bitmaps (Windows DIB .bmp format)

variable.name: sdl.host-key-name
variable.description: host key to toggle mouse and keyboard grab

variable.name: sdl.force-refresh
variable.description: force screen refresh every refresh period

variable.name: sdl.work-around-sdl-mouse-motion-coordinates-bug
variable.description: enable/disable work around SDL mouse motion coordinates bug
